description: tacos was splendid, especially their specialty, carne asada
not an authentic restaurant. not as good as what my grandma makes
very filling, the combination of rice, beans, and meats make it very healthy
Good food but they don't give me extra meat when I politely ask
good mix of rice and meat with the right amount of salad and pita bread. red sauce complements the rice very well
it's ok. nothing too crazy. the secret dressing on the menu was good tho
not too sweet, which is exactly what I was looking for. their cherry vanilla + raspberry gelato is top notch
oily, salty, too cheesy. not recommended!
$1 per slice and tasty. where else can you find such a restaurant?
